title: Therapeutic potential of Leea asiatica: Chemical isolation and validation of ethnomedicinal claims through in vitro and in silico assessment of antioxidant and anti-inflammatory properties
content:
Publication date: 15 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 19

Author(s): Khem Raj Joshi, Hari Prasad Devkota, Khalid Awadh Al-Mutairi, Koji Sugimura, Shoji Yahara, Ravindra Khadka, Shankar Thapa, Mohammad Ujair Shekh, Sandesh Poudel, Takashi Watanabe
